title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 3 Reaction on Rodgers Heroics, Stafford Statement, Herbert vs. Mahomes with Tyler Dunne
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 3 Reaction on Rodgers Heroics, Stafford Statement, Herbert vs. Mahomes with Tyler Dunne
description:
Colin reacts to NFL Week 3 and pinpoints what the Bucs were missing against the Rams (4:00), his biggest takeaway from the Chargers/Chiefs upset (8:00), why Bears fans need to stop attacking Matt Nagy (12:00), and biggest early season surprise team. Then, Packers insider Tyler Dunne - Go Long newsletter - and Colin discuss the wild Packers/49ers game (21:00), the glaring hole in the Niners' roster (25:00), what stands out about this year's Packers compared to other years (30:00), and which teams can give Aaron Rodgers and Green Bay the most problems. (33:00)

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
